meanings.sent1: She is italianizing her pasta sauce by adding fresh basil and tomatoes.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is italianizing its menu by adding more pasta dishes.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was italianizing, with red, green, and white decorations everywhere.

meanings.sent2: The italianizing of the neighborhood was evident in the new pizzeria and gelato shop.
